Energy Minister Denys Shmyhal stated that no fully operational power plants remain. Fuel supplies are sufficient for over 20 days, and gas restrictions are not in place. Police are increasing patrols to assist communities, particularly in Kyiv, Odesa region, and frontline areas.
properties.ai_reasoning:
[EN] The severe energy deficit (18 GW demand vs. 11 GW supply) cripples Ukraine's operational resilience, weakening civilian morale and military logistics, particularly in frontline areas. This energy crisis amplifies Ukraine's dependency on external aid, potentially straining international support systems. Increased police patrols indicate rising internal instability, diverting resources from military efforts.

[IT] Il grave deficit energetico (18 GW di domanda contro 11 GW di offerta) compromette la resilienza operativa
